short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HAVE AN IMPACTFUL VOICE FOR ISRAEL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Imagine having a world-class persuasion expert by your side
and whenever you need to speak up for Israel.

Talking with people about the Palestinian-Israeli conflict has never been easy. 

And now, with social media amplifying social polarization and rising anti-Semitism, it seems harder than ever.

That’s why we’ve created this tool for you, to help you hone your voice and have a real impact on those with whom you wish to have productive, and even pleasant conversations about Israel and the conflict.
